List Commands:
<color=#FFFF00>/{0}</color> - Enable/Disable GUI.
<color=#FFFF00>/{0} auto - Enable/Disable automated looting.
<color=#FFFF00>/{0} style "center/lite/right/custom" - change GUI style.
